name: Class UnknownTreeException
text:
Indicates that an unknown kind of Tree was encountered.  This
 can occur if the language evolves and new kinds of Trees are
 added to the Tree hierarchy.  May be thrown by a
 tree visitor to indicate that the
 visitor was created for a prior version of the language.
codes:
@Deprecated(since="11",
            forRemoval=true)
public class UnknownTreeException
extends RuntimeException

methods.description:
Returns the unknown tree.
 The value may be unavailable if this exception has been
 serialized and then read back in.

Returns the additional argument.
 The value may be unavailable if this exception has been
 serialized and then read back in.
